item.title: ISCM Event Series 2022 - A Future Resilience Through Smart City Lens
ArtTech Fusion for Future Smart Cities
item.description: ABOUT THE COMPETITION In the SMARTCITY+ event series, ArtTech Fusion 2021, which is hosted by the University of Economics Ho Chi Minh City (UEH), presided by the Institute of Smart City and Management (ISCM), co-organized by the Institute of Innovation (UII), UEH Youth union - Vietnamese Students' Association, and Phố Bên Đồi.
